page.title: 11Woods and Farms nr Woodsetts
page.content: There are 9{woods}in our D Block.The woods are{deciduous.}Some of them are owned by the{Forestry Commission.}The names of the woods are Hawks Wood,Old Spring Wood,Turner Wood,Dewidales Wood,Smarson Hills Wood,Broad,Wood Birket Wood,Anston Stones Wood,Old Meadow Wood,Lofties Plantation,Lindrick Dale Low Spring Wood,Moses Seat,Cotter Hill Woods,Anston Stones Wood is a{nature {reserve}and{Old Spring Wood}is used for{shooting.}The Land cover is mainly farm land .The crops that are grown are barley and wheat .On our D Block there are lots of foot paths and we have a {Golf course}that is Surrounded by Woodland and farmland. There are 7 farms. Deep Carrs Farm, Rackford Farm, Hoades Farm, Fan Field Farm, Bealbys Farm, Anston Grange Farm, Thorpe Hall Farm.
